attr.a:
For any open set S \in \mathcal{T}, f^{-1}(S) = f(S) = S \in \mathcal{T}.

Hence continuous.
attr.q: Let f:(X,\mathcal{T}) \rightarrow (X,\mathcal{T}) be the identity function. Show that f is continuous.
